segments.text: Hi Melissa , are you going home this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not this weekend . I have too much work to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My father lives in Washington DC .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My mother died two years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I am sorry to hear that . Is your father still working ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any family here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , two of my cousins live here and my aunt and uncle live about 30 miles from here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any brothers or sisters ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have two brothers who live in New York and a sister who lives in Boston .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you see them a lot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not as much as I'd like to . Usually just on holidays like Thanksgiving and Christmas .
segments.speaker: S2
